author: iocanel
msg: [SMX4-883] Added a a basic distribution which contains basic features. Renamed the existing distribution to apache-servicemix-4.x-jbi. Added a distribution with basic features which works fully offline.

author: hwright
msg: When posting candidate tarballs, take advantage of apache's FancyIndex option
(post_candidates): Put the warning text and the tarballs in the same

author: henrib
msg: Moved bitwise operations to JexlArithmetic (so they can be overriden);
Fixed small issue in Debugger that was not quoting identifiers that needed it;
Fixed issue in Interpreter that was reporting undefined variables when registers used as references contained null
